description:
1. [New] Customize the rules for testspec to script by Account Setting.
2. [New] Compare JET & XML files from TDA output.
3. [New] Execute and Validate AI Generated Script.

*[Note]
  If 'Permission Denied' error while upgrading to a new version, follow
  these steps:
      1. Navigate to the temporary folder within the TSS directory.
      2. Open the zip file by the 7-Zip File Manager.
      3. Extract (assets, src) into the root directory of the TSS tool.
